Package com.amilesend.onedrive.resource

Class DriveFolder

java.lang.Object
com.amilesend.onedrive.resource.DriveItemType
com.amilesend.onedrive.resource.DriveItemFolderType
com.amilesend.onedrive.resource.DriveFolder
public class DriveFolder extends DriveItemFolderType
A wrapper around a DriveItem that represents a folder.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DriveFolder(DriveItem delegate)
    Creates a new DriveFolder that wraps the given delegate DriveItem.

      public boolean isRoot()
      Describes if this folder is the root of the drive or not.
      Returns:
